ing: 1 (2 ounce) can black olives, drained and chopped
des: "Cocktail sauce makes this a different tasting dip.  People are amazed when they find out the 'secret ingredient'. Serve with crackers or tortilla chips."
ins: In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese and milk until smooth. Spread onto a large, round serving dish. Layer with cocktail sauce. Top with avocado. Layer with tomato, green bell pepper, green onions and black olives. Sprinkle with cheese. Chill in the refrigerator 1 hour, or until firm.
